tool_description: GroupDocs.Merger Cloud is a REST API that allows you to join multiple documents and manipulate single document structure across a wide range of supported document types.
name: GroupDocs.Merger Cloud
title: GroupDocs.Merger Cloud

error.message: ClientId is undefined. Please check authorization.

error.message: ClientId is undefined. Please check authorization.

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

IsLatest.description: Specifies whether the file is (true) or is not (false) the latest version of an file.

api_list.name: GetSupportedFileFormats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://groupdocs-merger-cloud1.p.rapidapi.com/merger/formats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "groupdocs-merger-cloud1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Join
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://groupdocs-merger-cloud1.p.rapidapi.com/merger/join"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "groupdocs-merger-cloud1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
